invalidateCall(changeFromOther : Int, sender : prime.core.traits.IInvalidatable) : Void

overrides prime.gui.styling.StyleSubBlock
Method is called when a property in the super- or extended-style is changed. If the property is not set in this style-object, it means that the allFilledPropertiesFlag needs to be changed..
